body:
Comment 5 by **Vasanth.Kumar@abyeti.com**: 
Adding to the information,

In IE the behavior is different. The tree view keeps growing as we expand the last node.
i.e the last element is supposed to have no option to expand, But it does have it, and
expanding it creates a copy of the last node with an expandable option on it.

Reproduced in IE 10.
